headline: Is PFAS RICO Class Action Ruling Altering The Investment Case For DuPont de Nemours (DD)?
summary: On January 6, 2026, a Montana federal judge refused to dismiss a class-action lawsuit alleging DuPont, Chemours, 3M and others concealed health risks from PFAS chemicals in firefighter turnout gear, allowing RICO and multi-state claims to proceed. The ruling highlights potential exposure to billions in alleged gear-replacement and health-related costs for gear makers, raising fresh questions about PFAS-related legal risk management. headline: Assessing DuPont De Nemours (DD) Valuation As PFAS Class-Action Lawsuit Advances In Federal Court
summary: DuPont de Nemours (DD) is back in focus after a Montana federal judge denied motions to dismiss a class-action lawsuit over PFAS in firefighter turnout gear, keeping key RICO and state-law claims alive. See our latest analysis for DuPont de Nemours. At a share price of $43.39, DuPont de Nemours has a 1 month share price return of 7.27%, while the 1 year total shareholder return is 38.25%.
